data.market_trends: Sustainable tourism is gaining traction, with many travelers opting for eco-friendly accommodations and experiences.
data.consumer_behavior: Travelers are increasingly researching destinations online and seeking personalized travel packages that cater to unique interests.
data.competitive_landscape: Denmark is positioned as a premium destination for travelers seeking both relaxation and activity.
data.seasonal_factors: Travel patterns are heavily influenced by festival seasons in Denmark; summer festivals drive tourism to specific cities.
